bill.summary:
Expresses support for the designation of June 2017 as National Gun Violence Awareness Month.
Calls on Congress to enact the following legislation to address gun violence:
H.R. 1475, the Gun Trafficking Prevention Act; H.R. 1478, the Gun Violence Research Act of 2017; H.R. 1612, the Gun Show Loophole Closing Act of 2017; and legislation to ban assault weapons and large capacity ammunition magazines.
